title: Math sem-2
content:
Is math sem 2 harder then math sem 1?
And how to study for math sem 2 [moving to P cycle]

comments.body: Yes, it is harder but once u get a hang of the concepts u can definitely do better than 1st sem maths. Do all cw problems, question banks and assignments for an s or a grade
What are the topics for Engineering mathematics-2; do you have any pdf with all the slides?

For us last year the topics were 1) integral calculus 2) probability 3) Laplace transformations 4) Fourier series
5) Fourier transformations

Solve from textbook please 
Especially Fourier series, transform and laplace. Last year the fourier series and transform questions were horrible but i somehow managed it because of textbook problems
Iâ€™d recommend BV Ramana 
Grewal is good for probability
